Neruzian Era Mafia


Welcome to the Neruzian Era, an
entire era
in which Mafia is played! Previously this era was extremely boring, but
someone
(i wonder who) has revealed to the people living here that
some of them are evil scheming scum planning the deaths of everything that is good in the world.


The solution to this problem is clear: Lynch the bastards!

Player List


Looker
Zdenek
(Town Echo): Absolutely Annihilated Night 3

bigbenwd
Faraday

(Townie): Crushed by weight of votes on Day 1

(Townie): Explosively Eviscerated Night 2

(Mafia Goon): Elected for
DEATH!
Day 2

hiplop
(Mafia Goon): Squashed by the Hammer Day 3



Players who confirm will have their name bolded. Upon death a player's name will be
struck out
and coloured as appropriate for their team. Their role will be added along with their means of demise and the time of death.



Some Rules

0:
I have all the authority as the mod,
all of it
. I promise to be as just, fair and consistent as humanly possible, but reserve the right to change anything in case i make a mistake.
1:
Unless otherwise
specifically
specified (that's very specific) by me and only me, you may not discuss the game outside the thread. Doing so will result in a mod kill or replacement of all involved and me being a sad panda. In the same vein you may not quote any private communication from me or other players including PMs and quicktopic. Finally, you may not post the links to the quicktopics.
2:
If you need my attention, either for questions or concerns, PM me or post in
Orange Bold
, i will be on the lookout for orange, bolded text and will respond to any querys in them as soon as possible.
3:
Modkills will result in the mod-killed player immediately losing the game. I will also then take whatever action is deemed most detrimental (that is, worst) for the faction involved in the modkill, this may include ending the day early (for a town modkill), not ending the day (for a scum modkill) or anything else that seems appropriate at the time.
4:
This green is mine, you cannot have it.


Gameplay

5:
Votes msut be in
bold
and typed as so:
Vote: PlayerName
. I would very much appreciate the use of vote tags by typing [*vote]Name of Person[*/vote] without the asterisks (*'s). While i will accept any bolded vote, i may not notice votes that are not in the vote tags, so save yourself and myself some time and use them tags."
6:
You do not have to unvote (using the unvote tags) before re-voting, but it is preferred as it will make my life easier and making the mod's life easier means a smoother game.
7:
You may vote for No Lynch as he is immune to lynches and thus doing so ends the day without anyone dying from a lynch.
8:
Lynches are reached instantly upon a majority (half + 1) of votes on a single player. If the timeline expires without a lynch being reached, no-one will be lynched and the game will proceed to Night.
9:
If you absolutely must make a bah post, PM me the post before you post it, i will clear it or not. If i do not clear your proposed bah post, you may not make it.
10:
Once a majority is reached the game enters the Twilight phase. You may continue to post during the Twilight phase, which lasts from the moment of majority to when i next check and lock the thread, but no votes made during the Twilight phase will be counted.
11:
Standard MafiaScum rules apply. No secret codes, no invisible text and no editing posts. If you're worried that something you are considering may be in violation of these rules, PM me with a query about your intended action first and i will tell you if it's ok or not.
12:
I will be using Natural Action Resolution to determine action results at night.
13:
Any of the roles specifically listed as Normal on The Wiki. In addition, there may be one other role that does not appear on that page but does not use any explicitly non-normal mechanics.

Deadlines and Such

14:
Days will default to lasting 2 weeks. The time may be extended under certain circumstances, such as a late replacement.
15:
Nights will end when i have recieved all night actions or when 48 hours have elapsed, whichever comes first. Players with night actions who do not wish to use those actions should send a 'no action' PM so as to not delay the night.
16:
Avoid lurking. While it is
technically
a strategy, it only really ruins the game for everyone else. Any player who does not post at least once every 48 hours will be poked. If i have to poke a player too many times, or the poke is not responded to, the player will be replaced.
17:
If you will be unable to post for an extended period of time (more than 48 hours) due to meatspace concerns, please notify me ahead of time either in PM or in the thread.

Other Things

18:
Mafia is an aggressive game, many players use aggression and\or insults as part of their play strategy. There are, however, limits. If a player is acting inappropriately action will be taken. The line is rather fuzzy and situationally dependant, so if you're worried you might be going to far, you probably are.
19:
First and foremost, mafia is a game. That means the primary goal is to have fun. HOWEVER, players who deliberately and knowingly play against their team's win condition will be frowned upon and probably replaced.


Sample Townie Role PM

You are a
Townie
.
You possess no admirable qualities, just your vote. Use it wisely for you are otherwise hapless and squishy.


Abilities:

[Day] - 1 Vote


Win Condition:

You win when all threats to the town are eliminated or nothing can prevent the same.


Confirm via PM.

Role PM's have been sent, i will confirm in-thread and in the topic when all players have responded. Until then feel free to chat but note that no votes will count until day 1 starts.

--EDIT--

Also, before the game starts, everyone please note:

15:
Nights will last 48 hours. I may also end nights early once all actions are sent in, but only if every player in the game is ok with this. State whether you wish nights to end early if all actions are recieved when you confirm, if you do not state a yes or no, i will assume no.
You're supposed to confirm in a PM, but you can confirm in thread too because why not :3
